properties.name: app.sensors.farm21.manufacturer
properties.description: The manufacturer of the sensor.

properties.name: app.sensors.farm21.fiwareDeviceIdPrefix
properties.description: The prefix of the device id in FIWARE.

properties.name: app.sensors.farm21.fiwareDeviceMeasurementIdPrefix
properties.description: The prefix of the sensor data id in FIWARE.

properties.name: app.sensors.farm21.enabled
properties.description: Whether the sensors are enabled or not.

properties.name: app.sensors.farm21.url
properties.description: The URL of the sensor manufacturer.

properties.name: app.sensors.farm21.username
properties.description: The username to access the API sensor manufacturer.

properties.name: app.sensors.farm21.password
properties.description: The password to access the API sensor manufacturer.

properties.name: app.sensors.farm21.apiToken
properties.description: The API token to access the API sensor manufacturer.
